Package hjb.msg.valuecopiers

Provides the interface and classes needed to allow values to be read and written from the properties of JMS messages.

Interface Summary
EncodedValueCopier EncodedValueCopier defines the methods used to read and write encoded values to or from JMS Messages

Package hjb.msg.valuecopiers Description

Provides the interface and classes needed to allow values to be read and written from the properties of JMS messages.

EncodedValueCopier defines the methods for reading and writing encoded values to and from JMS Message properties. There are implementations of this interface to support boolean, char, byte, short, int, long, double, float and string property values. All the implementations are actually subclasses of BaseEncodedValueCopier, which provides various utility methods used by all, as well as standard implementations of methods in Object.

OrderedPropertyValueCopier is an implementation of the EncodedValueCopier interface that combines all the other implementations in this package and should be used when the type to be read/written is unknown.
